name: It's good to be a pirate RPG
name_original: It's good to be a pirate RPG
description:
Playing "It's good to be a pirate RPG" you will find the typical RPG game with many things of the genre.
You will find a good story set in an ancient era and pirate characters.

While you play, you will discover the adventures of the main characters, as well as face great challenges in the form of puzzles and riddles.
Because puzzles are a very important part of this game.

What to expect:

-Good RPG story

-Charming characters

-Old ambientation and pirate story

-Puzzles and riddles


How to play:

-You just need arrow keys and space to move and interactuate, further instructions will be given while playing if necessary
